lead_paragraph: THE LATEST DODGE.-The Buffule Commerical advertiser say it understands that Mr. Chatfield, the Attorney General, has written letters all over the State, renouncing his former anti-canal heresies, and professing his readiness, if re-elected, to aid in carrying out a law which he has hitherto declared to be unconstitutional.
